scripts.minify:js: echo "- Minifying Javascript" && uglifyjs assets/scripts/main.js -o dist/public/js/main.min.js
scripts.minify:css: echo "- Minifying CSS" && cleancss assets/css/main.css -o dist/public/css/main.min.css
scripts.watch: watch "npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css " assets/scripts/ assets/css/
scripts.build: echo "=> building" && npm run test -s && npm run minify:js -s && npm run minify:css -s && npm run watch
